In this game Florencio combines two flavours of cheese to create the perfect early game push. value.title: A Genius Strategy to a Dumb Challenge (Mouse ONLY)  | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged pros to play with their mouse only (no keyboards!) to see what a pro StarCraft 2 game looks like with such a ridiculous rule. Here's Special (Terran) facing Cham (Zerg) trying it out! -- 🐷 Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom

value.title: Did 2 BCs break this guy's brain? - StarCraft 2
